meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of sounding like wood.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with the pleasant woodtones of the old piano.
meanings.sent2: I love the natural woodtones of the acoustic guitar.
meanings.sent3: The woodtones of the door creaking made it seem like it was talking.
meanings.sent4: The woodtones of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The woodtones of the violin echoed through the hall, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: The tones or sounds produced by wood.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter appreciated the rich woodtones of the furniture he crafted.
meanings.sent2: The speaker's voice had a warm quality, like woodtones in a cozy cabin.
meanings.sent3: The woodtones of the tree falling in the forest were surprisingly melodic.
meanings.sent4: The woodtones of the wind rustling through the trees created a soothing symphony.
meanings.sent5: The woodtones of the log cracking in the fireplace added to the cozy atmosphere of the room.
